ADDI 000 ri
SUBI 001 ri
MULI 010 ri
DIVI 011 ri
CMPI 100 ri
MOVI 101 ri
ADD 110000 rr
SUB 110001 rr
MUL 110010 rr
DIV 110011 rr
AND 110100 rr
OR  110101 rr
CMP 110110 rr
MOV 110111 rr
JNQ 111000 a
JEQ 111001 a
JLT 111010 a
JGT 111011 a
JMP 111100 a
IN  11110100000 r
OUT 11110100001 r
NOT 11110100010 r
LSHIFT 11110100011 r
RSHIFT 11110100100 r
RET 1111010010100000 z
MSF 1111010010100001 z
HLT 1111010010100010 z
DRPN 1111010010100011 z
DRTM 1111010010100100 z
ENGY 1111010010100101 z
FLST 1111010010100110 z
ADW 1111010010100111 z
